fields.name: Addresses
fields.description: The list of IP address ranges. Each range can be a either a subnet in CIDR format or an explicit start-end range of IP addresses.

fields.name: AutoAssign
fields.description: The indicator to determine if automatic allocation from the pool should occur.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name used to identify this IP address pool for association with a BGP advertisement.

fields.name: OnlyUseHostIPs
fields.description: The indicator to prevent the use of IP addresses ending with .0 and .255 for this pool. Enabling this option will only use IP addresses between .1 and .254 inclusive.
